extDescription.message: Yongera mu buryo bwikora inyongeramusaruro z’umwimerere mu bisubizo bya imeri.

uiNoOptions.message: Ubu nta mahitamo yo guhindura ahari.

uiSupport.message: Ukunda iyi inyongera? Dufashe n’ituro rito:

uiGithubText.message: Ku byerekeye raporo z’amakosa cyangwa ibindi bibazo, suzuma

uiBlacklistHeader.message: Urutonde rw’umukara rw’amazina ya dosiye (imiterere ya glob)

uiBlacklistHelp.message: Dosiye izo ari zo zose zifite izina rihuye n’imwe muri iyi miterere ntiziziyongera mu buryo bwikora. Imiterere imwe ku murongo. Urugero: *.png, smime.*, *.p7s

uiWarnBlacklistLabel.message: Menyesha niba inyongeramusaruro zasibwe n’urutonde rw’umukara

uiConfirmHelp.message: Agasanduku gato k’iyemezabikorwa kagaragara gusa iyo koko hari kwiyongeraho inyongeramusaruro. Mwandikisho: Y cyangwa J = Yego; N cyangwa Esc = Oya.

warnBlacklistIntro.message: Dosiye zikurikira ntiziziyongera mu buryo bwikora:
